title: The Sims 4 Deluxe Edition 2014 DLC RePack MULTi17-MAXAGENT
description:
::::::::::: MAXAGENT PRESENTS ::::::::::


:::: The Sims 4 Deluxe Edition 2014 DLC RePack MULTi17 ::::


::Information::


Release Date: September 2, 2014 
Genre: Strategy (God Sim / Manage / Busin. / Real-time) / 3D / Virtual pets 
Developer: Maxis 
Publisher: Electronic Arts 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: Russian / English / French / German / Spanish / Italian / Danish 
Czech / Finnish / Swedish / Dutch / Japanese / Korean / Polish / Portuguese 
Chinese / Portuguese-Brazilian 
Language: Simlish (Sims Own language)
Tablet: enclosing "RELOADED" 
Game Version: v.1.0.732.20 (Update 5)


::Description::


In The Sims 4 is no clear-cut plot, but the gameplay is not linear and has 
given the ultimate goal. The player controls his own created character, 
directing it to perform various activities and to create relationships with 
other characters similar to real life.


::System Requirements::


REQUIRED: Internet connection required for product activation.
OS: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8, 
or Windows 8.1
PROCESSOR: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or 
equivalent (For computers using built-in graphics chipsets, the game 
requires 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0 GHz AMD Turion 64 X2 TL-62 or equivalent)
MEMORY: At least 2 GB RAM
HARD DRIVE: At least 9 GB of free space with at least 1 GB additional space 
for custom content and saved games
DVD-ROM: DVD ROM drive required for installation only
VIDEO CARD: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported 
Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel 
GMA X4500 or better
SOUND CARD: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
DIRECTX: DirectX 9.0c compatible
INPUT: Keyboard and Mouse
